ygData.subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: Airbomber walked to Infectra and collapsed near her face down. Stranato finally caught up to Arrow and grabbed him. Both of them passed out as well. Blender

Airbomber walked to Infectra and collapsed near her face down. Stranato fin=
ally caught up to Arrow and grabbed him. Both of them passed out as well. B=
lender and Stroghold looked at each other and then shrugged again. They col=
lapsed as well. Train Wreck collapsed. Later, Airbomber wakes up. He walks =
a step and kneels down, he throws up and stands back up again before fallin=
g oveer again, the world was spinning. Stranato came back holding a sleepin=
g Arrow by his arm.

"Youuuu ookayyeeee?" Stranato asked.

"I thank sue." A=
irbomber replied. Stranato dropped Arrow and fell. He laughed and groaned. =
Airbomber looked back to Infectra to see if she was alright...
  ----- Orig=
inal Message ----- 
  From: ilovealllizards 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Se=
nt: Sunday, July 16, 2000 6:47 PM
  Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


  *Infect=
ra jumps up running behind a bush spitting the mixture out* Infectra:....oo=
hhh..... *Infectra moans because she was now getting a stomich ache* *Infec=
tra walks back out and falls on her back*
    ----- Original Message ----- =

    From: THECODE 
    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
    Sent: Sunday, July 16, =
2000 5:37 PM
    Subject: Neo Beast Wars


    Plintissa walked around the =
desert, night was falling (Is it okay for night to fall in Plintissa's area=
?) and she didn't believe her luck. Her scanner was broken, Artist's scanne=
r was broken or he was too stupid to use it, probably the latter, and she w=
as hungry, there wasn't anything but sand out here. Now that the sun was go=
ing down, it started to cool down and Plintissa was calmed. Plintissa walke=
d on, thinking about how miserable life had been to her, and that it only i=
ntended to get worse, why did she come to this planet anyway? Why did she l=
eave Cybertron? She remembered that she did indeed have ONE friend on Cyber=
tron, a friend that loved her with all heart, only problem was, Plintissa d=
idn't love this friend back, because the friend was a fembot. Plintissa's o=
ld friend was eventually killed by some bots in the shadows, never did catc=
h those creeps neither. She later learned that the murderers were a couple =
that had killed millions, but somehow always illuded the cops. Stupid polic=
e, never good enough when you need them to be REALLY good, maybe she was ex=
pecting too much. Plintissa seen something but assumed it was a mirage, she=
 assumed right...

    Artist walked along the desert, tapping his scanner,=
 it was broken. Either Plintissa's scanner was broken or she was too stupid=
 to use it, probably the latter, he couldn't believe his luck! Artist walke=
d through the desert, thinking about how boring his life was, he walked thr=
ough the desest, he served crippled bots, he hung around, he did good thing=
s and never was even noticed, he was tired of it all! The Maximals needed a=
 hero, he brung it to them, they never payed him any mind! Artist held his =
head in rage, his headache swelling, he snarled a snarl not normally done b=
y wovles. He transformed to Beast mode and ran across the desert, howling a=
nd remembering. He impaled Plintissa on a broken off autogun, he impaled Si=
nesis the same way, Plintissa blew him to pieces? He screamed in arge and p=
assed out...

    Dracona walked around the corner, she wouldn't miss the c=
hance to screw something up in the Pred base since nobody seemed to be ther=
e! Dracona slowly made for the entrance...

    Gangon's spark started goin=
g dim and started to fade, seeing as how it has been seperated from it's bo=
dy for so long...

    Sinesis woke up from Stasis lock and pulled away fro=
m Blizzard, in extreme pain, he pulled past Quickstrike andf threw Sinister=
's parts into a CR Tank. Then falling in himself, going into stasis lock. (=
Orchid is unable to reply at the moment, so I went ahead and took my charac=
ters to the CR Chamber, don't want them dead.)

    The Radicons went on ea=
ting the stuff and Train Wreck took the time to examine it.

    "This was =
made with poisonous verries and poisonous mushrooms." Train Wreck said. Str=
anato looked at Arrow with a "Going to kill" look and stood up. He waved fo=
r Arrow to come. Arrow started to walk away. Stranato followed him. Arrow r=
an! Stranato chased him. Blender and Stronghold shrugged and drank beer.

 =
   "That was still good eating." Stronghold said.

    "I don't feel too we=
ll." Airbomber said. Stronghold and Blender laughed. Train Wreck rolled his=
 eyes and examined the other stuff in the weirf food made by Arrow. Squirre=
l meat? Weird...

    Deemos walked right up to the Maximal base, hoping th=
e autoguns wouldn't fire, and headed toward the entrance...

--------------=
